divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on Highway 13 coming back from Dickson TN. There was a bright flash of light to my left and when I looked up I saw the round shaped objects moving rapidly. They were beaming light to the ground in front of them. It was really bright. They looked fuzzy and could not focus on therm clearly. They then shot up in went out of sight.
Summary: Two objects streaked accross the sky from south to north hitting the earth to the north with lights
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clarksville
This sighting has never been favorited.
